body.name: Clorox Fraganzia In-Wash Scent Booster Crystals in Lavender with Eucalyptus Scent, 18 Oz | Laundry Scent Booster Crystals | Lavender Laundry Fragrance 18 Ounce Crystals
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 52 mins
features: GIVE YOUR NEXT LOAD OF LAUNDRY THAT EXTRA BOOST — Clorox Fraganzia Laundry Crystals will leave your clothing, towels, and sheets smelling fresh and clean. This means you can get those extra t-shirt wears in before your next load of laundry
SAFE FOR ALL COLORS AND FABRICS — Don’t fear! Laundry scent boosters are safe on all colors and fabrics, making this the perfect enhancer for both your crisp white towels and work pants

FRESH-SMELLING LAUNDRY HAS NEVER BEEN SO EASY — To use these fabric freshener crystals, simply toss them directly into your washing machine before loading laundry. You can decide if you’d like just a touch of added fragrance, or a long-lasting fresh scent
AN IRRESISTIBLE SCENT THAT’LL TURN HEADS — Don’t be surprised when curious co-workers or friends ask about your new signature scent. Lavender with Eucalyptus is a soothing scent you'll love
AVAILABLE IN MULTIPLE SIZES AND SCENTS — Clorox Fraganzia in-wash laundry crystals are available in multiple sizes and scents to suit your needs
body.description: Why shouldn't clean smell beautiful? The unique scents of Clorox Fraganzia enhance your home and complement their tough deodorizing capabilities. The nature-inspired scents are incredibly long-lasting and exude freshness. Clorox Fraganzia is dedicated to a scent-sational laundry experience. rnrnThese new Clorox Fraganzia In-Wash Scent Booster Crystals in Lavender with Eucalyptus scent give your laundry that long-lasting, clean scent that will stay with your clothes long after they’ve left the laundry. These laundry scent boosters will help make the dreaded laundry day a bit more enjoyable. Every time you fold the laundry or get dressed, you’ll enjoy the fragrance over and over when you use these freshener crystals in your wash. This container includes 18oz ounces of crystals that are easy to use by simply tossing in your washing machine before each load.rnrnThe scent booster laundry crystals are safe for all colors and fabrics. They are incredibly easy to use as a laundry freshener, making them the perfect addition to your laundry routine. To use, simply pour crystals directly into your washing machine before loading your laundry. Use the convenient cap to pour a little for a touch of added fragrance, or you can add a lot of crystals for an ocean scent that lasts. Do not put crystals in your liquid fabric softener dispenser or in your dryer. Clorox Fragranzia In-Wash Scent Booster Crystals will make your laundry smell good after every wash.rnrnCaution: Keep out of reach of children. Do not ingest. If swallowed, drink a glass of water. Do not induce vomiting.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Clorox Fraganzia Laundry Solutions: Your Incentive To Get To That Towering Laundry Pile Knock Something Off Of Your To Do List Fewer wrinkles = less time spent ironing. Go ahead, take the dog out on that walk you promised, put the finishing touches on your favorite dish, or take on that e-mail inbox. No One Likes Clingy Laundry Who wants their laundry clinging to them? Fraganzia laundry solutions control static, preventing your clothes from sticking to you (and each other). Sweaty Clothes Have Met Their Toughest Opponent Your child finally brought home last season's sweaty hockey jersey. We give it one cycle until it smells like delicious lavender. Goal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I did the math for all big chain stores and also through other Amazon laundry scent beads you can purchase, and these are by far the best bang for your buck. I highly recommend. They dissolve just fine in the washer and make my laundry smell great. You they recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My ABSOLUTE FAVORITE THING on laundry day.
reviews.reviewText: I love this stuff. Although it doesn't quite smell like roses it is close enough. Hope it never gets discontinued

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the smell but wish it lasted longer.
reviews.reviewText: I just recently started using scented laundry beads/crystals when a sample pack was included with my new washing machine. So, naturally, being a massive fan of anything that smells good, I jumped on Amazon and perused all the different brands and scents and prices available. These were the ones I decided on (Clorox linen) and they DO smell nice but the scent just doesn't linger long enough for what I would prefer. Price was definitely good compared to many other brands, the amount I received in the 2 pack was even better, but I will try another brand next time. Just smelling from the bottle, heavenly. I did catch a whiff after washing on a sweater I didn't dry at all, but once everything else went into the dryer, there was barely any scent left unfortunately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Can’t beat the price! Smells AMAZING! Get it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sufficient, probably won’t buy again
reviews.reviewText: This smells so so good in the package so I expected it to have a stronger scent after washing and drying, I assumed that was the point. My hope was our sheets and towels would have that luscious smell-good to them, but they don’t. It’s very faint if at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I hate giving bad reviews but you get what you pay for because first it’s like dust and there is deep beautiful lavender smell like snuggles and others. If you don’t want something to strong then it’s perfect!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good fragrance for the money
reviews.reviewText: I bought these as a less expensive alternative to the Downy unstoppables. 2 came in the pack and these are a finer granular texture versus a larger bead. I do feel you get more product for the money. Fragrance was good, not amazing like the unstoppables, but to be honest you use less and you still have fresher fragranced clothes. I got the linen fragrance because I was hesitating to go with TOO much scent.
Does not add scent to your washing at all, does not work so was a complete waste of money.
This product makes no difference to your wash. It is a waste of money.
Nice fragrance, if you are willing to be liberal with it. By that I mean the entire 70oz container will be enough for maybe 5 loads. Pity.
This product does not make any difference at all to your wash, it is a waste of money
